499091.title_tl: Serbisyo ng Coin, Vending, at Amusement Machine Serbisyo/Repairer

499092.title: Commercial Diver
499092.description: Work below surface of water, using surface-supplied air or scuba equipment to inspect, repair, remove, or install equipment and structures. May use a variety of power and hand tools, such as drills, sledgehammers, torches, and welding equipment. May conduct tests or experiments, rig explosives, or photograph structures or marine life.
499092.typical_training: Postsecondary certificate, No work experience, 1 to 12 months on-the-job training
499092.title_ja: コマーシャル・ダイバー

499094.title: Locksmiths and Safe Repairer
499094.description: Repair and open locks, make keys, change locks and safe combinations, and install and repair safes.
499094.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, No work experience, More than 1 year on-the-job training
499094.title_es: Cerrajero y Reparador de Cajas de Seguridad
499094.title_ja: 錠前屋と安全な修理業者
499094.title_tl: Mga panday-panday at Ligtas na Tagaayos

499095.title: Manufactured Building and Mobile Home Installer
499095.official_title: Manufactured Building and Mobile Home Installers
499095.description: Move or install mobile homes or prefabricated buildings.
499095.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, No work experience, Less than 1 month on-the-job training
499095.title_es: Instalador de Estructuras Prefabricadas y de Casas Rodantes
499095.title_en: Manufactured Building and Mobile Home Installer
499095.title_zh: 人造建筑和移动房屋安装商
499095.title_ja: 製造されたビルおよびモバイルホームインストーラー
499095.title_tl: Manufactured Building at Mobile Home Installer

499096.title: Rigger
499096.description: Set up or repair rigging for construction projects, manufacturing plants, logging yards, ships and shipyards, or for the entertainment industry.
499096.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, No work experience, 1 to 12 months on-the-job training

499097.title: Signal and Track Switch Repairer
499097.description: Install, inspect, test, maintain, or repair electric gate crossings, signals, signal equipment, track switches, section lines, or intercommunications systems within a railroad system.
499097.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, No work experience, 1 to 12 months on-the-job training
499097.title_es: Reparador de Señales y Sistemas de Cambio de Vías de Ferrocarril
499097.title_zh: 信号和轨道开关维修器
499097.title_ja: 信号およびトラックスイッチリペアラ
499097.title_tl: Tagapag-ayos ng Paglipat ng Signal at Subaybayan

499098.title: Helper (Installation, Maintenance, and Repair Worker)
499098.description: Help installation, maintenance, and repair workers in maintenance, parts replacement, and repair of vehicles, industrial machinery, and electrical and electronic equipment. Perform duties such as furnishing tools, materials, and supplies to other workers; cleaning work area, machines, and tools; and holding materials or tools for other workers.
499098.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, No work experience, Less than 1 month on-the-job training
499098.title_es: Ayudante con la Instalación, Mantenimiento y Reparación
499098.title_zh: 助手（安装、维护和维修人员）
499098.title_ja: ヘルパー（設置、保守、修理作業員）
499098.title_tl: Helper (Pag-install, Pagpapanatili, at Pagkukumpuni ng Manggagawa)

499099.title: Installation, Maintenance, and Repair Worker
499099.official_title: Installation, Maintenance, and Repair Workers, All Other
499099.description: All installation, maintenance, and repair workers not listed separately.
499099.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, No work experience, 1 to 12 months on-the-job training
499099.title_es: Trabajador con la Instalación, Mantenimiento y Reparación
499099.title_tl: Pag-install, Pagpapanatili, at Pagkumpuni ng Manggagawa

511011.title: Supervisor of Production and Operating Workers
511011.official_title: First-Line Supervisors of Production and Operating Workers
511011.description: Directly supervise and coordinate the activities of production and operating workers, such as inspectors, precision workers, machine setters and operators, assemblers, fabricators, and plant and system operators.
511011.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, Less than 5 years work experience, No on-the-job training
511011.title_es: Supervisor Directo de Trabajadores de Producción y Operación
511011.title_en: Supervisor of Production and Operating Workers
511011.title_ja: 生産および運用作業員のスーパーバイザー
511011.title_tl: Superbisor ng Produksyon at Operating Workers

512011.title: Aircraft Structure, Surfaces, Rigging, and Systems Assembler
512011.official_title: Aircraft Structure, Surfaces, Rigging, and Systems Assemblers
512011.description: Assemble, fit, fasten, and install parts of airplanes, space vehicles, or missiles, such as tails, wings, fuselage, bulkheads, stabilizers, landing gear, rigging and control equipment, or heating and ventilating systems.
512011.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, No work experience, 1 to 12 months on-the-job training
512011.title_es: Ensamblador de Estructuras, Superficies, Aparejos y Sistemas de Aeronaves
512011.title_en: Aircraft Structure, Surfaces, Rigging, and Systems Assembler
512011.title_zh: 飞机结构、表面、索具和系统装配工
512011.title_ja: 航空機の構造、サーフェス、リギング、およびシステムアセンブラ
512011.title_tl: Sasakyang Panghimpapawid Istraktura, Mga Ibabaw, Rigging, at Systems

512021.title: Coil Winder/Taper/Finisher
512021.description: Wind wire coils used in electrical components, such as resistors and transformers, and in electrical equipment and instruments, such as field cores, bobbins, armature cores, electrical motors, generators, and control equipment.
512021.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, No work experience, 1 to 12 months on-the-job training
512021.title_ja: コイルワインダー/テーパー/フィニッシャ

512022.title: Electrical and Electronic Equipment Assembler
512022.description: Assemble or modify electrical or electronic equipment, such as computers, test equipment telemetering systems, electric motors, and batteries.
512022.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, No work experience, 1 to 12 months on-the-job training
512022.title_es: Ensamblador de Equipo Eléctrico y Electrónico
512022.title_zh: 电气和电子设备装配工
512022.title_ja: 電気・電子機器アセンブラ

512023.title: Electromechanical Equipment Assembler
512023.description: Assemble or modify electromechanical equipment or devices, such as servomechanisms, gyros, dynamometers, magnetic drums, tape drives, brakes, control linkage, actuators, and appliances.
512023.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, No work experience, 1 to 12 months on-the-job training
512023.title_ja: 電気機械装置アセンブラ

512031.title: Engine and Other Machine Assembler
512031.description: Construct, assemble, or rebuild machines, such as engines, turbines, and similar equipment used in such industries as construction, extraction, textiles, and paper manufacturing.
512031.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, No work experience, 1 to 12 months on-the-job training
512031.title_es: Ensamblador de Motores y Otras Máquinas
512031.title_zh: 发动机和其他机器装配工
512031.title_ja: エンジン・その他機械アセンブラ
512031.title_tl: Engine at Iba Pang Machine Assembler

512041.title: Structural Metal Fabricator/Fitter
512041.description: Fabricate, position, align, and fit parts of structural metal products. Shipfitters are included in “Layout Workers, Metal and Plastic”.
512041.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, No work experience, 1 to 12 months on-the-job training
512041.title_ja: 構造用金属加工業者/フィッター

512051.title: Fiberglass Laminator/Fabricator
512051.description: Laminate layers of fiberglass on molds to form boat decks and hulls, bodies for golf carts, automobiles, or other products.
512051.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, No work experience, 1 to 12 months on-the-job training
512051.title_es: Laminador/Fabricador de Productos de Fibra de Vidrio
512051.title_zh: 玻璃纤维层压机/制造商
512051.title_ja: グラスファイバーラミネーター/ファブリケーター

512061.title: Timing Device Assembler/Adjuster
512061.description: Perform precision assembling or adjusting, within narrow tolerances, of timing devices such as digital clocks or timing devices with electrical or electronic components. Watchmakers are included in “Watch and Clock Repairers”.
512061.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, No work experience, 1 to 12 months on-the-job training
512061.title_zh: 定时设备装配器/调节器
512061.title_ja: タイミングデバイスアセンブラ/アジャスタ

512092.title: Team Assembler
512092.description: Work as part of a team having responsibility for assembling an entire product or component of a product. Team assemblers can perform all tasks conducted by the team in the assembly process and rotate through all or most of them, rather than being assigned to a specific task on a permanent basis. May participate in making management decisions affecting the work. Includes team leaders who work as part of the team. Assemblers who continuously perform the same task are classified elsewhere in 51-2000.
512092.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, No work experience, 1 to 12 months on-the-job training

512099.title: Assembler/Fabricator
512099.description: All assemblers and fabricators not listed separately.
512099.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, No work experience, 1 to 12 months on-the-job training
512099.title_ja: アセンブラー/ファブリケーター

513011.title: Baker
513011.description: Mix and bake ingredients to produce breads, rolls, cookies, cakes, pies, pastries, or other baked goods. Pastry chefs in restaurants and hotels are included with “Chefs and Head Cooks”.
513011.typical_training: No formal educational credential, No work experience, More than 1 year on-the-job training

513021.title: Butcher or Meat Cutter
513021.description: Cut, trim, or prepare consumer-sized portions of meat for use or sale in retail establishments.
513021.typical_training: No formal educational credential, No work experience, More than 1 year on-the-job training
513021.title_ja: 肉屋またはミートカッター

513022.title: Meat, Poultry, and Fish Cutter and Trimmer
513022.official_title: Meat, Poultry, and Fish Cutters and Trimmers
513022.description: Use hands or hand tools to perform routine cutting and trimming of meat, poultry, and seafood.
513022.typical_training: No formal educational credential, No work experience, Less than 1 month on-the-job training
513022.title_es: Cortadore y Fileteador de Carne, Aves y Pescados en Crudo
513022.title_en: Meat, Poultry, and Fish Cutter and Trimmer
513022.title_zh: 肉类、家禽和鱼类切割机和修剪器
513022.title_ja: 肉、鶏肉、魚のカッターとトリマー
513022.title_tl: Karne, Manok, at Pamutol ng Isda at Trimmer

513023.title: Slaughterer or Meat Packer
513023.description: Perform nonroutine or precision functions involving the preparation of large portions of meat. Work may include specialized slaughtering tasks, cutting standard or premium cuts of meat for marketing, making sausage, or wrapping meats. Work typically occurs in slaughtering, meat packing, or wholesale establishments.
513023.typical_training: No formal educational credential, No work experience, Less than 1 month on-the-job training
513023.title_ja: スロータラーまたはミートパッカー

513091.title: Food Roasting, Baking, and Drying Machine Operator
513091.official_title: Food and Tobacco Roasting, Baking, and Drying Machine Operators and Tenders
513091.description: Operate or tend food or tobacco roasting, baking, or drying equipment, including hearth ovens, kiln driers, roasters, char kilns, and vacuum drying equipment.
513091.typical_training: No formal educational credential, No work experience, 1 to 12 months on-the-job training
513091.title_es: Operador de Tostar, Hornear y Secar Alimentos
513091.title_en: Food Roasting, Baking, and Drying Machine Operator
513091.title_zh: 食品烘焙、烘焙和烘干机操作员
513091.title_ja: 食品ロースト、ベーキング、乾燥機オペレーター
513091.title_tl: Pagluluto ng Pagkain, Paghurno, at Pagpapatayo ng Machine Operator

513092.title: Food Batchmaker
513092.description: Set up and operate equipment that mixes or blends ingredients used in the manufacturing of food products. Includes candy makers and cheese makers.
513092.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, No work experience, 1 to 12 months on-the-job training
513092.title_es: Preparador de Mezclas de Productos Alimenticios
513092.title_ja: フードバッチメーカー

513093.title: Food Cooking Machine Operator
513093.official_title: Food Cooking Machine Operators and Tenders
513093.description: Operate or tend cooking equipment, such as steam cooking vats, deep fry cookers, pressure cookers, kettles, and boilers, to prepare food products.
513093.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, No work experience, 1 to 12 months on-the-job training
513093.title_ja: 食品調理機オペレーター

513099.title: Food Processing Worker
513099.description: All food processing workers not listed separately
513099.typical_training: No formal educational credential, No work experience, 1 to 12 months on-the-job training
513099.title_es: Trabajador Relacionado con el Procesamiento de Alimentos

514021.title: Extruding and Drawing Machine Operator
514021.official_title: Extruding and Drawing Machine Setters, Operators, and Tenders, Metal and Plastic
514021.description: Set up, operate, or tend machines to extrude or draw thermoplastic or metal materials into tubes, rods, hoses, wire, bars, or structural shapes.
514021.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, No work experience, 1 to 12 months on-the-job training
514021.title_es: Operador de Máquina de Extrusión y Estirado
514021.title_ja: 押し出し・延伸機オペレーター
514021.title_tl: Pagpilit at Pagguhit ng Operator ng Machine

514022.title: Forging Machine Operator
514022.official_title: Forging Machine Setters, Operators, and Tenders, Metal and Plastic
514022.description: Set up, operate, or tend forging machines to taper, shape, or form metal or plastic parts.
514022.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, No work experience, 1 to 12 months on-the-job training

514023.title: Rolling Machine Operator
514023.official_title: Rolling Machine Setters, Operators, and Tenders, Metal and Plastic
514023.description: Set up, operate, or tend machines to roll steel or plastic forming bends, beads, knurls, rolls, or plate, or to flatten, temper, or reduce gauge of material.
514023.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, No work experience, 1 to 12 months on-the-job training

514031.title: Cutting, Punching, and Press Machine Operator
514031.official_title: Cutting, Punching, and Press Machine Setters, Operators, and Tenders, Metal and Plastic
514031.description: Set up, operate, or tend machines to saw, cut, shear, slit, punch, crimp, notch, bend, or straighten metal or plastic material.
514031.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, No work experience, 1 to 12 months on-the-job training
514031.title_es: Operador de Corte, Punzón y Prensado
514031.title_en: Cutting, Punching, and Press Machine Operator
514031.title_zh: 切割、冲孔和冲压机操作员
514031.title_ja: 切断、打ち抜き、プレス機のオペレーター
514031.title_tl: Pagputol, Pagsuntok, at Pindutin ang Operator ng Machine

514032.title: Drilling and Boring Machine Tool Operator
514032.official_title: Drilling and Boring Machine Tool Setters, Operators, and Tenders, Metal and Plastic
514032.description: Set up, operate, or tend drilling machines to drill, bore, ream, mill, or countersink metal or plastic work pieces.
514032.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, No work experience, 1 to 12 months on-the-job training
514032.title_es: Operador Herramienta de Taladrar y Perforar
514032.title_en: Drilling and Boring Machine Tool Operator
514032.title_ja: ドリルとボーリング工作機械のオペレーター
514032.title_tl: Pagbabarena at Pagbubutas Machine Tool Operator

514033.title: Grinding, Lapping, Polishing, and Buffing Machine Tool Operator
514033.official_title: Grinding, Lapping, Polishing, and Buffing Machine Tool Setters, Operators, and Tenders, Metal and Plastic
514033.description: Set up, operate, or tend grinding and related tools that remove excess material or burrs from surfaces, sharpen edges or corners, or buff, hone, or polish metal or plastic work pieces.
514033.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, No work experience, 1 to 12 months on-the-job training
514033.title_es: Operador Herramienta de Lijar, Facetear, Pulir y Lustrar
514033.title_en: Grinding, Lapping, Polishing, and Buffing Machine Tool Operator
514033.title_zh: 研磨、研磨、抛光和抛光机床操作员
514033.title_ja: 研削、ラッピング、研磨、バフ研磨工作機械オペレーター
514033.title_tl: Paggiling, Lapping, Buli, at Buffing Machine Tool Operator

514034.title: Lathe and Turning Machine Tool Operator
514034.official_title: Lathe and Turning Machine Tool Setters, Operators, and Tenders, Metal and Plastic
514034.description: Set up, operate, or tend lathe and turning machines to turn, bore, thread, form, or face metal or plastic materials, such as wire, rod, or bar stock.
514034.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, No work experience, 1 to 12 months on-the-job training
514034.title_en: Lathe and Turning Machine Tool Operator
514034.title_zh: 车床和车削机床操作员
514034.title_ja: 旋盤・旋盤工作機械オペレーター
514034.title_tl: Pagpapatakbo ng Tool ng Machine at Pagbukas ng Machine

514035.title: Milling and Planing Machine Operator
514035.official_title: Milling and Planing Machine Setters, Operators, and Tenders, Metal and Plastic
514035.description: Set up, operate, or tend milling or planing machines to mill, plane, shape, groove, or profile metal or plastic work pieces.
514035.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, No work experience, 1 to 12 months on-the-job training
514035.title_ja: フライス盤とプレーニングマシンのオペレーター
514035.title_tl: Paggiling at Pagpaplano ng Machine Operator

514041.title: Machinist
514041.description: Set up and operate a variety of machine tools to produce precision parts and instruments out of metal. Includes precision instrument makers who fabricate, modify, or repair mechanical instruments. May also fabricate and modify parts to make or repair machine tools or maintain industrial machines, applying knowledge of mechanics, mathematics, metal properties, layout, and machining procedures. Machinists who primarily program or operate computer numerically controlled (CNC) equipment are classified in “Computer Numerically Controlled Tool Operators and Programmers”.
514041.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, No work experience, More than 1 year on-the-job training

514051.title: Metal-Refining Furnace Operator
514051.description: Operate or tend furnaces, such as gas, oil, coal, electric-arc or electric induction, open-hearth, or oxygen furnaces, to melt and refine metal before casting or to produce specified types of steel.
514051.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, No work experience, 1 to 12 months on-the-job training
514051.title_es: Operador de Hornos de Refinación de Metal
514051.title_ja: 金属精製炉オペレーター
514051.title_tl: Operator ng Pagpipino ng Pugon ng Metal

514052.title: Metal Pourer/Caster
514052.description: Operate hand-controlled mechanisms to pour and regulate the flow of molten metal into molds to produce castings or ingots.
514052.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, No work experience, 1 to 12 months on-the-job training
514052.title_ja: メタルポアラー/キャスター

514061.title: Metal and Plastic Model Maker
514061.description: Set up and operate machines, such as lathes, milling and engraving machines, and jig borers to make working models of metal or plastic objects. Includes template makers.
514061.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, No work experience, 1 to 12 months on-the-job training
514061.title_zh: 金属和塑料模型制造商
514061.title_ja: 金属・プラモデルメーカー

514062.title: Metal and Plastic Patternmaker
514062.description: Lay out, machine, fit, and assemble castings and parts to metal or plastic foundry patterns, core boxes, or match plates.
514062.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, No work experience, 1 to 12 months on-the-job training
514062.title_ja: 金属とプラスチックのパターンメーカー

514071.title: Foundry Mold and Core Maker
514071.description: Make or form wax or sand cores or molds used in the production of metal castings in foundries.
514071.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, No work experience, 1 to 12 months on-the-job training
514071.title_es: Fabricante de Moldes de Fundición y Hormas Matrices
514071.title_zh: 铸造模具和型芯制造商
514071.title_ja: 鋳物金型とコアメーカー

514072.title: Molding, Coremaking, and Casting Machine Operator
514072.official_title: Molding, Coremaking, and Casting Machine Setters, Operators, and Tenders, Metal and Plastic
514072.description: Set up, operate, or tend metal or plastic molding, casting, or coremaking machines to mold or cast metal or thermoplastic parts or products.
514072.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, No work experience, 1 to 12 months on-the-job training
514072.title_es: Operador para Matrices y Moldes de Fundición
514072.title_en: Molding, Coremaking, and Casting Machine Operator
514072.title_zh: 成型、制芯和铸造机操作员
514072.title_ja: 成形、コアメイキング、鋳造機オペレーター
514072.title_tl: Paghubog, Paggawa ng Coremaking, at Operator ng Machine

514081.title: Metal and Plastic Machine Tool Operator
514081.official_title: Multiple Machine Tool Setters, Operators, and Tenders, Metal and Plastic
514081.description: Set up, operate, or tend more than one type of cutting or forming machine tool or robot.
514081.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, No work experience, 1 to 12 months on-the-job training
514081.title_en: Metal and Plastic Machine Tool Operator
514081.title_zh: 金属和塑料机床操作员
514081.title_ja: 金属・プラスチック工作機械オペレーター
514081.title_tl: Operator ng Tool ng Metal at Plastic Machine

514111.title: Tool and Die Maker
514111.description: Analyze specifications, lay out metal stock, set up and operate machine tools, and fit and assemble parts to make and repair dies, cutting tools, jigs, fixtures, gauges, and machinists’ hand tools.
514111.typical_training: Postsecondary certificate, No work experience, More than 1 year on-the-job training

514121.title: Welder/Cutter/Solderer/Brazer
514121.description: Use hand-welding, flame-cutting, hand-soldering, or brazing equipment to weld or join metal components or to fill holes, indentations, or seams of fabricated metal products.
514121.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, No work experience, 1 to 12 months on-the-job training
514121.title_zh: 焊工/切割机/焊工/钎焊机
514121.title_ja: 溶接機/カッター/はんだ付け器/ブレイザー

514122.title: Welding/Soldering/Brazing Machine Operator
514122.official_title: Welding, Soldering, and Brazing Machine Setters, Operators, and Tenders
514122.description: Set up, operate, or tend welding, soldering, or brazing machines or robots that weld, braze, solder, or heat treat metal products, components, or assemblies. Includes workers who operate laser cutters or laser-beam machines.
514122.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, No work experience, 1 to 12 months on-the-job training
514122.title_es: Operador de Soldadura de Metal, Estaño y Latón
514122.title_zh: 焊接/焊接/钎焊机操作员
514122.title_ja: 溶接・はんだ付け・ろう付け機オペレーター

514191.title: Metal and Plastic Heat Treating Equipment Operator
514191.official_title: Heat Treating Equipment Setters, Operators, and Tenders, Metal and Plastic
514191.description: Set up, operate, or tend heating equipment, such as heat-treating furnaces, flame-hardening machines, induction machines, soaking pits, or vacuum equipment to temper, harden, anneal, or heat treat metal or plastic objects.
514191.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, No work experience, 1 to 12 months on-the-job training
514191.title_es: Operador de Tratamiento Térmico, Metal y Plástico
514191.title_en: Metal and Plastic Heat Treating Equipment Operator
514191.title_zh: 金属和塑料热处理设备操作员
514191.title_ja: 金属およびプラスチック熱処理装置オペレーター
514191.title_tl: Metal at Plastic Heat Treating Equipment Operator

514192.title: Metal and Plastic Layout Worker
514192.description: Lay out reference points and dimensions on metal or plastic stock or workpieces, such as sheets, plates, tubes, structural shapes, castings, or machine parts, for further processing. Includes shipfitters.
514192.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, No work experience, 1 to 12 months on-the-job training
514192.title_ja: 金属とプラスチックのレイアウト作業員
514192.title_tl: Manggagawa ng Metal at Plastic Layout

514193.title: Metal and Plastic Plating Machine Operator
514193.official_title: Plating Machine Setters, Operators, and Tenders, Metal and Plastic
514193.description: Set up, operate, or tend plating machines to coat metal or plastic products with chromium, zinc, copper, cadmium, nickel, or other metal to protect or decorate surfaces. Typically, the product being coated is immersed in molten metal or an electrolytic solution.
514193.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, No work experience, 1 to 12 months on-the-job training
514193.title_en: Metal and Plastic Plating Machine Operator
514193.title_zh: 金属和塑料电镀机操作员
514193.title_ja: 金属・プラスチックめっき機オペレーター
514193.title_tl: Metal at Plastic Plating Machine Operator

514194.title: Tool Grinder/Filer/Sharpener
514194.description: Perform precision smoothing, sharpening, polishing, or grinding of metal objects.
514194.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, No work experience, 1 to 12 months on-the-job training
514194.title_zh: 工具研磨机/锉刀器/磨刀器
514194.title_ja: 工具研削盤/フィルター/シャープナー

514199.title: Metal or Plastic Worker
514199.official_title: Metal Workers and Plastic Workers, All Other
514199.description: All metal workers and plastic workers not listed separately.
514199.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, No work experience, 1 to 12 months on-the-job training
514199.title_es: Trabajador Relacionado con la Producción de Metal y Plástico
514199.title_ja: 金属またはプラスチックの労働者

515111.title: Prepress Technician/Worker
515111.description: Format and proof text and images submitted by designers and clients into finished pages that can be printed. Includes digital and photo typesetting. May produce printing plates.
515111.typical_training: Postsecondary certificate, No work experience, No on-the-job training
515111.title_ja: プリプレス技術者/作業者

515112.title: Printing Press Operator
515112.description: Set up and operate digital, letterpress, lithographic, flexographic, gravure, or other printing machines. Includes short-run offset printing presses.
515112.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, No work experience, 1 to 12 months on-the-job training

515113.title: Print Binding and Finishing Worker
515113.description: Bind books and other publications or finish printed products by hand or machine. May set up binding and finishing machines.
515113.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, No work experience, 1 to 12 months on-the-job training
515113.title_es: Trabajador de Encuadernación y Acabado de Imprenta
515113.title_ja: 製本と仕上げ作業員の印刷

516011.title: Laundry and Dry-Cleaning Worker
516011.description: Operate or tend washing or dry-cleaning machines to wash or dry-clean industrial or household articles, such as cloth garments, suede, leather, furs, blankets, draperies, linens, rugs, and carpets. Includes spotters and dyers of these articles.
516011.typical_training: No formal educational credential, No work experience, Less than 1 month on-the-job training
516011.title_ja: ランドリー・ドライクリーニング作業員

516021.title: Presser (Textiles and Garments)
516021.official_title: Pressers, Textile, Garment, and Related Materials
516021.description: Press or shape articles by hand or machine.
516021.typical_training: No formal educational credential, No work experience, Less than 1 month on-the-job training
516021.title_ja: プレッサー (繊維・衣料品)

516031.title: Sewing Machine Operator
516031.description: Operate or tend sewing machines to join, reinforce, decorate, or perform related sewing operations in the manufacture of garment or nongarment products.
516031.typical_training: No formal educational credential, No work experience, Less than 1 month on-the-job training

516041.title: Shoe and Leather Worker/Repairer
516041.official_title: Shoe and Leather Workers and Repairers
516041.description: Construct, decorate, or repair leather and leather-like products, such as luggage, shoes, and saddles. May use hand tools.
516041.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, No work experience, 1 to 12 months on-the-job training
516041.title_zh: 制鞋和皮革工人/修理工
516041.title_ja: 靴と皮革作業員/修理工

516042.title: Shoe Machine Operator
516042.description: Operate or tend a variety of machines to join, decorate, reinforce, or finish shoes and shoe parts.
516042.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, No work experience, Less than 1 month on-the-job training

516051.title: Hand Sewer
516051.description: Sew, join, reinforce, or finish, usually with needle and thread, a variety of manufactured items. Includes weavers and stitchers.
516051.typical_training: No formal educational credential, No work experience, 1 to 12 months on-the-job training

516052.title: Tailors/Dressmakers/Custom Sewer
516052.description: Design, make, alter, repair, or fit garments.
516052.typical_training: No formal educational credential, No work experience, 1 to 12 months on-the-job training
516052.title_ja: テーラー/ドレスメーカー/カスタム下水道

516061.title: Textile Bleaching/Dyeing Machine Operator
516061.official_title: Textile Bleaching and Dyeing Machine Operators and Tenders
516061.description: Operate or tend machines to bleach, shrink, wash, dye, or finish textiles or synthetic or glass fibers.
516061.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, No work experience, Less than 1 month on-the-job training
516061.title_zh: 纺织品漂白/染色机操作员
516061.title_ja: 繊維漂白/染色機オペレーター

516062.title: Textile Cutting Machine Operator
516062.official_title: Textile Cutting Machine Setters, Operators, and Tenders
516062.description: Set up, operate, or tend machines that cut textiles.
516062.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, No work experience, 1 to 12 months on-the-job training
516062.title_ja: 繊維切断機オペレーター
516062.title_tl: Operator ng Pagputol ng Machine ng Tela

516063.title: Textile Knitting and Weaving Machine Operator
516063.official_title: Textile Knitting and Weaving Machine Setters, Operators, and Tenders
516063.description: Set up, operate, or tend machines that knit, loop, weave, or draw in textiles.
516063.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, No work experience, Less than 1 month on-the-job training
516063.title_es: Operador Textil de Tejido y Tramado
516063.title_en: Textile Knitting and Weaving Machine Operator
516063.title_zh: 纺织针织和编织机操作员
516063.title_ja: 繊維編み・織機オペレーター
516063.title_tl: Textile Pagniniting at Paghabi Machine Operator

516064.title: Textile Winding/Twisting/Drawing-Out Machine Operator
516064.official_title: Textile Winding, Twisting, and Drawing Out Machine Setters, Operators, and Tenders
516064.description: Set up, operate, or tend machines that wind or twist textiles; or draw out and combine sliver, such as wool, hemp, or synthetic fibers. Includes slubber machine and drawing frame operators.
516064.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, No work experience, 1 to 12 months on-the-job training
516064.title_es: Operador Textil de Devanado, Torsión y Cardado
516064.title_zh: 纺织品缠绕/加捻/拉出机操作员
516064.title_ja: 繊維巻線/ねじり/引き抜き機オペレーター

516091.title: Synthetic and Glass Fibers Extruding and Forming Machine Operator
516091.official_title: Extruding and Forming Machine Setters, Operators, and Tenders, Synthetic and Glass Fibers
516091.description: Set up, operate, or tend machines that extrude and form continuous filaments from synthetic materials, such as liquid polymer, rayon, and fiberglass.
516091.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, No work experience, 1 to 12 months on-the-job training
516091.title_es: Operador de Extrusión y Moldeado de Fibras Sintéticas y de Vidrio
516091.title_en: Synthetic and Glass Fibers Extruding and Forming Machine Operator
516091.title_zh: 合成纤维和玻璃纤维挤出成型机操作员
516091.title_ja: 合成繊維およびガラス繊維押出成形機オペレーター
516091.title_tl: Gawa ng tao at Glass Fibers Extruding at Bumubuo ng Machine Operator

516092.title: Fabric and Apparel Patternmaker
516092.description: Draw and construct sets of precision master fabric patterns or layouts. May also mark and cut fabrics and apparel.
516092.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, No work experience, 1 to 12 months on-the-job training
516092.title_ja: ファブリックとアパレルパターンメーカー

516093.title: Upholsterer
516093.description: Make, repair, or replace upholstery for household furniture or transportation vehicles.
516093.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, No work experience, 1 to 12 months on-the-job training

516099.title: Textile, Apparel, and Furnishings Worker
516099.official_title: Textile, Apparel, and Furnishings Workers, All Other
516099.description: All textile, apparel, and furnishings workers not listed separately.
516099.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, No work experience, Less than 1 month on-the-job training
516099.title_es: Trabajador Textil de Indumentaria y Accesorios
516099.title_ja: テキスタイル、アパレル、および調度品作業員
516099.title_tl: Manggagawa sa tela, kasuotan, at Kakayusang Manggagawa

517011.title: Cabinetmaker/Bench Carpenter
517011.description: Cut, shape, and assemble wooden articles or set up and operate a variety of woodworking machines, such as power saws, jointers, and mortisers to surface, cut, or shape lumber or to fabricate parts for wood products.
517011.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, No work experience, 1 to 12 months on-the-job training
517011.title_ja: 家具職人/ベンチカーペンター

517021.title: Furniture Finisher
517021.description: Shape, finish, and refinish damaged, worn, or used furniture or new high-grade furniture to specified color or finish.
517021.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, No work experience, Less than 1 month on-the-job training
517021.title_es: Ebanista Encargado del Acabado de Muebles

517031.title: Wood Model Maker
517031.description: Construct full-size and scale wooden precision models of products. Includes wood jig builders and loft workers.
517031.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, No work experience, 1 to 12 months on-the-job training
517031.title_ja: ウッドモデルメーカー

517032.title: Wood Patternmaker
517032.description: Plan, lay out, and construct wooden unit or sectional patterns used in forming sand molds for castings.
517032.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, No work experience, 1 to 12 months on-the-job training
517032.title_ja: ウッドパターンメーカー

517041.title: Wood Sawing Machine Operator
517041.official_title: Sawing Machine Setters, Operators, and Tenders, Wood
517041.description: Set up, operate, or tend wood sawing machines. May operate computer numerically controlled (CNC) equipment. Includes lead sawyers. Workers who primarily program or operate CNC equipment are classified in “Computer Numerically Controlled Tool Operators and Programmers”.
517041.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, No work experience, 1 to 12 months on-the-job training
517041.title_ja: 木材切断機オペレーター

517042.title: Woodworking Machine Operator
517042.official_title: Woodworking Machine Setters, Operators, and Tenders, Except Sawing
517042.description: Set up, operate, or tend woodworking machines, such as drill presses, lathes, shapers, routers, sanders, planers, and wood nailing machines. May operate computer numerically controlled (CNC) equipment. Workers who primarily program or operate CNC equipment are classified in “Computer Numerically Controlled Tool Operators and Programmers”.
517042.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, No work experience, 1 to 12 months on-the-job training
517042.title_ja: 木工機械オペレーター

517099.title: Woodworker
517099.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, No work experience, 1 to 12 months on-the-job training

518011.title: Nuclear Power Reactor Operator
518011.description: Operate or control nuclear reactors. Move control rods, start and stop equipment, monitor and adjust controls, and record data in logs. Implement emergency procedures when needed. May respond to abnormalities, determine cause, and recommend corrective action.
518011.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, No work experience, More than 1 year on-the-job training
518011.title_es: Operador de Reactor de Energía Nuclear

518012.title: Power Distributor/Dispatcher
518012.description: Coordinate, regulate, or distribute electricity or steam.
518012.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, No work experience, More than 1 year on-the-job training
518012.title_ja: 配電器/ディスパッチャー

518013.title: Power Plant Operator
518013.description: Control, operate, or maintain machinery to generate electric power. Includes auxiliary equipment operators.
518013.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, No work experience, More than 1 year on-the-job training
518013.title_es: Operador de Planta de Energía Eléctrica

518021.title: Stationary Engineer/Boiler Operator
518021.description: Operate or maintain stationary engines, boilers, or other mechanical equipment to provide utilities for buildings or industrial processes. Operate equipment such as steam engines, generators, motors, turbines, and steam boilers.
518021.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, No work experience, More than 1 year on-the-job training
518021.title_es: Operador de Caldera y Mecánico de Maquinaria Fija
518021.title_zh: 固定工程师/锅炉操作员
518021.title_ja: 定置式エンジニア/ボイラーオペレーター

518031.title: Water and Wastewater Treatment Plant and System Operator
518031.official_title: Water and Wastewater Treatment Plant and System Operators
518031.description: Operate or control an entire process or system of machines, often through the use of control boards, to transfer or treat water or wastewater.
518031.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, No work experience, More than 1 year on-the-job training
518031.title_es: Operador de Planta y Sistema de Tratamiento de Aguas y Aguas Residuales
518031.title_en: Water and Wastewater Treatment Plant and System Operator
518031.title_zh: 水和污水处理厂和系统操作员
518031.title_ja: 上下水処理プラントおよびシステムオペレーター
518031.title_tl: Plant at System Operator ng Tubig at Wastewater

518091.title: Chemical Plant and System Operator
518091.description: Control or operate entire chemical processes or system of machines.
518091.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, No work experience, 1 to 12 months on-the-job training
518091.title_es: Operador de Planta y Sistema de Procesos Químicos
518091.title_ja: 化学プラントおよびシステムオペレーター

518092.title: Gas Plant Operator
518092.description: Distribute or process gas for utility companies and others by controlling compressors to maintain specified pressures on main pipelines.
518092.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, No work experience, More than 1 year on-the-job training
518092.title_ja: ガスプラントオペレーター

518093.title: Petroleum Pump System Operator, Refinery Operator, or Gauger
518093.official_title: Petroleum Pump System Operators, Refinery Operators, and Gaugers
518093.description: Operate or control petroleum refining or processing units. May specialize in controlling manifold and pumping systems, gauging or testing oil in storage tanks, or regulating the flow of oil into pipelines.
518093.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, No work experience, 1 to 12 months on-the-job training
518093.title_es: Operador de Sistema de Bombeo de Petróleo, Operador de Refinería y Calibradores
518093.title_en: Petroleum Pump System Operator, Refinery Operator, or Gauger
518093.title_zh: 石油泵系统操作员、炼油厂操作员或 Gauger
518093.title_ja: 石油ポンプシステムオペレーター、製油所オペレーター、またはGauger
518093.title_tl: Operator ng Petroleum Pump System, Operator ng Pagdalisayan ng petrolyo, o Gauger

518099.title: Plant and System Operator
518099.official_title: Plant and System Operators, All Other
518099.description: All plant and system operators not listed separately.
518099.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, No work experience, 1 to 12 months on-the-job training
518099.title_ja: プラントおよびシステムオペレーター

519011.title: Chemical Equipment Operator
519011.description: Operate or tend equipment to control chemical changes or reactions in the processing of industrial or consumer products. Equipment used includes devulcanizers, steam-jacketed kettles, and reactor vessels.
519011.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, No work experience, 1 to 12 months on-the-job training
519011.title_ja: 化学機器オペレーター

519012.title: Separating/Filtering/Clarifying/Precipitating/Still Machine Operator
519012.official_title: Separating, Filtering, Clarifying, Precipitating, and Still Machine Setters, Operators, and Tenders
519012.description: Set up, operate, or tend continuous flow or vat-type equipment; filter presses; shaker screens; centrifuges; condenser tubes; precipitating, fermenting, or evaporating tanks; scrubbing towers; or batch stills. These machines extract, sort, or separate liquids, gases, or solids from other materials to recover a refined product. Includes dairy processing equipment operators.
519012.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, No work experience, 1 to 12 months on-the-job training
519012.title_zh: 分离/过滤/澄清/沉淀/蒸馏机操作员
519012.title_ja: 分離/ろ過/浄化/沈殿/スチルマシンオペレーター

519021.title: Crushing/Grinding/Polishing Machine Operator
519021.official_title: Crushing, Grinding, and Polishing Machine Setters, Operators, and Tenders
519021.description: Set up, operate, or tend machines to crush, grind, or polish materials, such as coal, glass, grain, stone, food, or rubber.
519021.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, No work experience, 1 to 12 months on-the-job training
519021.title_zh: 粉碎/研磨/抛光机操作员
519021.title_ja: 破砕・研削・研磨機オペレーター
519021.title_tl: Pagdurog/Paggiling ng Buli ng Machine Operator

519022.title: Grinding and Polishing Worker
519022.description: Grind, sand, or polish, using hand tools or hand-held power tools, a variety of metal, wood, stone, clay, plastic, or glass objects. Includes chippers, buffers, and finishers.
519022.typical_training: No formal educational credential, No work experience, 1 to 12 months on-the-job training
519022.title_es: Trabajador de Molido y Pulido Manual

519023.title: Mixing and Blending Machine Operator
519023.official_title: Mixing and Blending Machine Setters, Operators, and Tenders
519023.description: Set up, operate, or tend machines to mix or blend materials, such as chemicals, tobacco, liquids, color pigments, or explosive ingredients.
519023.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, No work experience, 1 to 12 months on-the-job training
519023.title_ja: 混合混合機オペレーター

519031.title: Cutter/Trimmer
519031.description: Use hand tools or hand-held power tools to cut and trim a variety of manufactured items, such as carpet, fabric, stone, glass, or rubber.
519031.typical_training: No formal educational credential, No work experience, Less than 1 month on-the-job training

519032.title: Cutting and Slicing Machine Operator
519032.official_title: Cutting and Slicing Machine Setters, Operators, and Tenders
519032.description: Set up, operate, or tend machines that cut or slice materials, such as glass, stone, cork, rubber, tobacco, food, paper, or insulating material.
519032.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, No work experience, 1 to 12 months on-the-job training
519032.title_es: Operador de Máquinas de Cortar y Rebanar
519032.title_ja: 切断・スライス機オペレーター
519032.title_tl: Pagputol at Pagpipiraso ng Machine Operator

519041.title: Extruding/Forming/Pressing/Compacting Machine Operator
519041.official_title: Extruding, Forming, Pressing, and Compacting Machine Setters, Operators, and Tenders
519041.description: Set up, operate, or tend machines, such as glass-forming machines, plodder machines, and tuber machines, to shape and form products such as glassware, food, rubber, soap, brick, tile, clay, wax, tobacco, or cosmetics.
519041.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, No work experience, 1 to 12 months on-the-job training
519041.title_es: Operador de Máquinas de Extrusión, Moldeado, Prensado y Compactación
519041.title_zh: 挤出/成型/压制/压实机操作员
519041.title_ja: 押し出し/成形/プレス/締固め機オペレーター

519051.title: Furnace/Kiln/Oven/Drier/Kettle Operator
519051.official_title: Furnace, Kiln, Oven, Drier, and Kettle Operators and Tenders
519051.description: Operate or tend heating equipment other than basic metal, plastic, or food processing equipment. Includes activities such as annealing glass, drying lumber, curing rubber, removing moisture from materials, or boiling soap.
519051.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, No work experience, 1 to 12 months on-the-job training
519051.title_zh: 熔炉/窑/烤箱/干燥机/水壶操作员
519051.title_ja: 炉/窯/オーブン/乾燥機/ケトルオペレーター

519061.title: Production Inspector/Tester
519061.official_title: Inspectors, Testers, Sorters, Samplers, and Weighers
519061.description: Inspect, test, sort, sample, or weigh nonagricultural raw materials or processed, machined, fabricated, or assembled parts or products for defects, wear, and deviations from specifications. May use precision measuring instruments and complex test equipment.
519061.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, No work experience, 1 to 12 months on-the-job training

519071.title: Jeweler or Precious Stone and Metal Worker
519071.official_title: Jewelers and Precious Stone and Metal Workers
519071.description: Design, fabricate, adjust, repair, or appraise jewelry, gold, silver, other precious metals, or gems. Includes diamond polishers and gem cutters, and persons who perform precision casting and modeling of molds, casting metal in molds, or setting precious and semiprecious stones for jewelry and related products.
519071.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, No work experience, More than 1 year on-the-job training
519071.title_es: Joyero o Trabajador de Piedras y Metales Preciosos
519071.title_en: Jeweler or Precious Stone and Metal Worker
519071.title_zh: 珠宝商或宝石和金属工人
519071.title_ja: 宝石商または貴石と金属労働者
519071.title_tl: Alahero o Mahalagang Stone at Metal Worker

519081.title: Dental Laboratory Technician
519081.description: Construct and repair full or partial dentures or dental appliances.
519081.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, No work experience, 1 to 12 months on-the-job training

519082.title: Medical Appliance Technician
519082.description: Construct, maintain, or repair medical supportive devices such as braces, orthotics and prosthetic devices, joints, arch supports, and other surgical and medical appliances.
519082.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, No work experience, 1 to 12 months on-the-job training

519083.title: Ophthalmic Laboratory Technician
519083.description: Cut, grind, and polish eyeglasses, contact lenses, or other precision optical elements. Assemble and mount lenses into frames or process other optical elements. Includes precision lens polishers or grinders, centerer-edgers, and lens mounters.
519083.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, No work experience, 1 to 12 months on-the-job training

519111.title: Packaging and Filling Machine Operator
519111.official_title: Packaging and Filling Machine Operators and Tenders
519111.description: Operate or tend machines to prepare industrial or consumer products for storage or shipment. Includes cannery workers who pack food products.
519111.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, No work experience, 1 to 12 months on-the-job training
519111.title_es: Operador de Máquinas de Empaque y Envasado
519111.title_ja: 包装および充填機オペレーター
519111.title_tl: Packaging at Pagpuno ng Operator ng Machine

519123.title: Painting, Coating, and Decorating Worker
519123.description: Paint, coat, or decorate articles, such as furniture, glass, plateware, pottery, jewelry, toys, books, or leather.
519123.typical_training: No formal educational credential, No work experience, 1 to 12 months on-the-job training
519123.title_es: Trabajador de Pintura, Esmaltado y Decoración

519124.title: Coating, Painting, and Spraying Machine Operator
519124.official_title: Coating, Painting, and Spraying Machine Setters, Operators, and Tenders
519124.description: Set up, operate, or tend spraying or rolling machines to coat or paint any of a wide variety of products, including glassware, cloth, ceramics, metal, plastic, paper, or wood, with lacquer, silver, copper, rubber, varnish, glaze, enamel, oil, or rust-proofing materials. Includes painters of transportation vehicles such as painters in auto body repair facilities.
519124.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, No work experience, 1 to 12 months on-the-job training
519124.title_es: Operador de Revestir, Pintar y Rociar
519124.title_en: Coating, Painting, and Spraying Machine Operator
519124.title_zh: 涂装、喷漆和喷涂机操作员
519124.title_ja: 塗装、塗装、スプレー機のオペレーター
519124.title_tl: Patong, Pagpipinta, at Pagsabog ng Machine Operator

519141.title: Semiconductor Processing Technician
519141.description: Perform any or all of the following functions in the manufacture of electronic semiconductors: load semiconductor material into furnace; saw formed ingots into segments; load individual segment into crystal growing chamber and monitor controls; locate crystal axis in ingot using x-ray equipment and saw ingots into wafers; and clean, polish, and load wafers into series of special purpose furnaces, chemical baths, and equipment used to form circuitry and change conductive properties.
519141.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, No work experience, 1 to 12 months on-the-job training

519151.title: Photographic Processing Machine Operator
519151.official_title: Photographic Process Workers and Processing Machine Operators
519151.description: Perform work involved in developing and processing photographic images from film or digital media. May perform precision tasks such as editing photographic negatives and prints.
519151.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, No work experience, Less than 1 month on-the-job training
519151.title_es: Operador de Máquina de Procesamiento Fotográfico
519151.title_ja: 写真加工機オペレーター

519161.title: Computer Numerically Controlled Tool Operator
519161.description: Operate computer-controlled tools, machines, or robots to machine or process parts, tools, or other work pieces made of metal, plastic, wood, stone, or other materials. May also set up and maintain equipment.
519161.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, No work experience, 1 to 12 months on-the-job training
519161.title_es: Operador de Máquinas Herramienta con Control Numérico Computadorizado
519161.title_zh: 计算机数控刀具操作员
519161.title_ja: コンピューター数値制御ツールオペレーター
519161.title_tl: Operator ng Tool na Kinokontrol ng Numerikal

519162.title: Computer Numerically Controlled Tool Programmer
519162.description: Develop programs to control machining or processing of materials by automatic machine tools, equipment, or systems. May also set up, operate, or maintain equipment.
519162.typical_training: Postsecondary certificate, No work experience, 1 to 12 months on-the-job training
519162.title_es: Programador de Máquinas Herramienta con Control Numérico Computadorizado
519162.title_zh: 计算机数控工具编程器
519162.title_ja: コンピュータ数値制御ツールプログラマ
519162.title_tl: Computer Numero Kinokontrol na Tool Programmer

519191.title: Adhesive Bonding Machine Operator
519191.official_title: Adhesive Bonding Machine Operators and Tenders
519191.description: Operate or tend bonding machines that use adhesives to join items for further processing or to form a completed product. Processes include joining veneer sheets into plywood; gluing paper; or joining rubber and rubberized fabric parts, plastic, simulated leather, or other materials.
519191.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, No work experience, 1 to 12 months on-the-job training
519191.title_es: Operador de Máquinas de Cemento Adhesivo
519191.title_ja: 接着剤ボンディングマシンオペレーター

519192.title: Cleaning, Washing, and Metal Pickling Equipment Operator
519192.official_title: Cleaning, Washing, and Metal Pickling Equipment Operators and Tenders
519192.description: Operate or tend machines to wash or clean products, such as barrels or kegs, glass items, tin plate, food, pulp, coal, plastic, or rubber, to remove impurities.
519192.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, No work experience, 1 to 12 months on-the-job training
519192.title_es: Operador de Equipos de Limpieza, Lavado y Decapado Metálico
519192.title_en: Cleaning, Washing, and Metal Pickling Equipment Operator
519192.title_zh: 清洁、清洗和金属酸洗设备操作员
519192.title_ja: 洗浄、洗浄、金属酸洗設備オペレーター
519192.title_tl: Paglilinis, Paghuhugas, at Metal Pag-aatsara Kagamitan Operator

519193.title: Cooling and Freezing Equipment Operator
519193.official_title: Cooling and Freezing Equipment Operators and Tenders
519193.description: Operate or tend equipment such as cooling and freezing units, refrigerators, batch freezers, and freezing tunnels, to cool or freeze products, food, blood plasma, and chemicals.
519193.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, No work experience, 1 to 12 months on-the-job training
519193.title_es: Operador de Equipos de Enfriamiento y Congelamiento
519193.title_zh: 冷却和冷冻设备操作员
519193.title_ja: 冷房・冷凍設備オペレーター

519194.title: Etcher/Engraver
519194.description: Engrave or etch metal, wood, rubber, or other materials. Includes such workers as etcher-circuit processors, pantograph engravers, and silk screen etchers. Photoengravers are included in “Prepress Technicians and Workers”.
519194.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, No work experience, 1 to 12 months on-the-job training
519194.title_ja: エッチャー/エングレーバー

519195.title: Molder/Shaper/Caster
519195.official_title: Molders, Shapers, and Casters, Except Metal and Plastic
519195.description: Mold, shape, form, cast, or carve products such as food products, figurines, tile, pipes, and candles consisting of clay, glass, plaster, concrete, stone, or combinations of materials.
519195.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, No work experience, More than 1 year on-the-job training
519195.title_ja: モルダー/シェイパー/キャスター

519196.title: Paper Goods Machine Operator
519196.official_title: Paper Goods Machine Setters, Operators, and Tenders
519196.description: Set up, operate, or tend paper goods machines that perform a variety of functions, such as converting, sawing, corrugating, banding, wrapping, boxing, stitching, forming, or sealing paper or paperboard sheets into products.
519196.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, No work experience, 1 to 12 months on-the-job training
519196.title_es: Operador de Fabricación de Artículos de Papel
519196.title_ja: 紙製品機械オペレーター

519197.title: Tire Builder
519197.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, No work experience, 1 to 12 months on-the-job training

519198.title: Helper (Production Worker)
519198.description: Help production workers by performing duties requiring less skill. Duties include supplying or holding materials or tools, and cleaning work area and equipment. Apprentice workers are classified in the appropriate production occupations.
519198.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, No work experience, Less than 1 month on-the-job training
519198.title_ja: ヘルパー (プロダクションワーカー)

519199.title: Production Worker
519199.description: All production workers not listed separately.
519199.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, No work experience, 1 to 12 months on-the-job training
519199.title_ja: プロダクションワーカー

531041.title: Aircraft Cargo Handling Supervisor
531041.description: Supervise and coordinate the activities of ground crew in the loading, unloading, securing, and staging of aircraft cargo or baggage. May determine the quantity and orientation of cargo and compute aircraft center of gravity. May accompany aircraft as member of flight crew and monitor and handle cargo in flight, and assist and brief passengers on safety and emergency procedures. Includes loadmasters.
531041.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, Less than 5 years work experience, No on-the-job training
531041.title_es: Supervisor de Transporte Aéreo de Carga
531041.title_ja: 航空機貨物取扱責任者

531042.title: Supervisor of Helpers, Laborers, and Material Movers
531042.official_title: First-Line Supervisors of Helpers, Laborers, and Material Movers, Hand
531042.description: Directly supervise and coordinate the activities of helpers, laborers, or material movers, hand.
531042.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, Less than 5 years work experience, No on-the-job training
531042.title_es: Supervisor Directo de Ayudante, Obreros y Acarreadores Manuales de Materiales
531042.title_en: Supervisor of Helpers, Laborers, and Material Movers
531042.title_zh: 助手、劳动者和物料搬运工主管
531042.title_ja: ヘルパー、労働者、資材移動者のスーパーバイザー
531042.title_tl: Superbisor ng mga katulong, manggagawa, at Materyal na Tagagalaw

531043.title: Supervisor of Material-Moving Machine and Vehicle Operators
531043.official_title: First-Line Supervisors of Material-Moving Machine and Vehicle Operators
531043.description: Directly supervise and coordinate activities of material-moving machine and vehicle operators and helpers.
531043.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, Less than 5 years work experience, No on-the-job training
531043.title_es: Supervisor Directo de Operador de Máquinas y Vehículos de Transporte y de Traslado de Materiales
531043.title_en: Supervisor of Material-Moving Machine and Vehicle Operators
531043.title_zh: 物料搬运机械和车辆操作员主管
531043.title_ja: 資材移動機械および車両オペレーターのスーパーバイザー
531043.title_tl: Superbisor ng Materyal na Paglipat ng Machine at Mga Operator ng Sasakyan

531044.title: Supervisor of Passenger Attendants
531044.description: Supervise and coordinate activities of passenger attendants. Includes supervisors of “Flight Attendants”.
531044.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, Less than 5 years work experience, No on-the-job training
531044.title_es: Supervisor Directo de Auxiliar de Pasajeros
531044.title_ja: 旅客アテンダントのスーパーバイザー
531044.title_tl: Superbisor ng mga Attendant ng Pasahero

531049.title: Supervisor of Transportation Worker
531049.official_title: First-Line Supervisors of Transportation Workers, All Other
531049.description: All first-line supervisors of transportation workers not listed separately.
531049.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, Less than 5 years work experience, No on-the-job training
531049.title_ja: 運輸労働者のスーパーバイザー

532011.title: Airline Pilot/Flight Engineer
532011.official_title: Airline Pilots, Copilots, and Flight Engineers
532011.description: Pilot and navigate the flight of fixed-wing aircraft, usually on scheduled air carrier routes, for the transport of passengers and cargo. Requires Federal Air Transport certificate and rating for specific aircraft type used. Includes regional, national, and international airline pilots and flight instructors of airline pilots.
532011.typical_training: Bachelor's degree, Less than 5 years work experience, 1 to 12 months on-the-job training
532011.title_zh: 航空公司飞行员/飞行工程师
532011.title_ja: 航空会社のパイロット/フライトエンジニア

532012.title: Commercial Pilot
532012.description: Pilot and navigate the flight of fixed-wing aircraft on nonscheduled air carrier routes, or helicopters. Requires Commercial Pilot certificate. Includes charter pilots with similar certification, and air ambulance and air tour pilots.
532012.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, No work experience, 1 to 12 months on-the-job training

532021.title: Air Traffic Controller
532021.description: Control air traffic on and within vicinity of airport, and movement of air traffic between altitude sectors and control centers, according to established procedures and policies. Authorize, regulate, and control commercial airline flights according to government or company regulations to expedite and ensure flight safety.
532021.typical_training: Associate's degree, No work experience, More than 1 year on-the-job training

532022.title: Airfield Operations Specialist
532022.description: Ensure the safe takeoff and landing of commercial and military aircraft. Duties include coordination between air-traffic control and maintenance personnel, dispatching, using airfield landing and navigational aids, implementing airfield safety procedures, monitoring and maintaining flight records, and applying knowledge of weather information.
532022.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, No work experience, More than 1 year on-the-job training
532022.title_ja: 飛行場オペレーションスペシャリスト

532031.title: Flight Attendant
532031.description: Monitor safety of the aircraft cabin. Provide services to airline passengers, explain safety information, serve food and beverages, and respond to emergency incidents.
532031.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, Less than 5 years work experience, 1 to 12 months on-the-job training

533011.title: Ambulance Driver/Attendant
533011.official_title: Ambulance Drivers and Attendants, Except Emergency Medical Technicians
533011.description: Drive ambulance or assist ambulance driver in transporting sick, injured, or convalescent persons. Assist in lifting patients.
533011.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, No work experience, 1 to 12 months on-the-job training
533011.title_ja: 救急車の運転手/アテンダント

533031.title: Driver/Sales Worker
533031.description: Drive truck or other vehicle over established routes or within an established territory and sell or deliver goods, such as food products, including restaurant take-out items, or pick up or deliver items such as commercial laundry. May also take orders, collect payment, or stock merchandise at point of delivery.
533031.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, No work experience, Less than 1 month on-the-job training

533032.title: Heavy and Tractor-Trailer Truck Driver
533032.description: Drive a tractor-trailer combination or a truck with a capacity of at least 26,001 pounds Gross Vehicle Weight (GVW). May be required to unload truck. Requires commercial drivers’ license. Includes tow truck drivers.
533032.typical_training: Postsecondary certificate, No work experience, Less than 1 month on-the-job training
533032.title_es: Conductor de Camión Pesado y Tractocamión
533032.title_zh: 重型和拖拉机拖车卡车司机
533032.title_ja: 大型およびトラクタートレーラートラックの運転手

533033.title: Light Truck Driver
533033.description: Drive a light vehicle, such as a truck or van, with a capacity of less than 26,001 pounds Gross Vehicle Weight (GVW), primarily to pick up merchandise or packages from a distribution center and deliver. May load and unload vehicle.
533033.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, No work experience, Less than 1 month on-the-job training

533051.title: School Bus Driver
533051.description: Drive a school bus to transport students. Ensure adherence to safety rules. May assist students in boarding or exiting.
533051.typical_training: No formal educational credential, No work experience, Less than 1 month on-the-job training
533051.title_ja: スクールバスの運転手

533052.title: Transit and Intercity Bus Driver
533052.description: Drive bus or motor coach, including regular route operations, charters, and private carriage. May assist passengers with baggage. May collect fares or tickets.
533052.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, No work experience, 1 to 12 months on-the-job training
533052.title_es: Conductor de Autobús, Tránsito e Interurbano
533052.title_ja: トランジットとインターシティバスの運転手

533053.title: Shuttle Driver and Chauffeur
533053.description: Drive a motor vehicle to transport passengers on a planned or scheduled basis. May collect a fare. Includes nonemergency medical transporters and hearse drivers.
533053.typical_training: No formal educational credential, No work experience, Less than 1 month on-the-job training
533053.title_es: Conductor de Vehículos de Servicios de Transporte y Chofér
533053.title_ja: シャトルドライバーと運転手

533054.title: Taxi Driver
533054.description: Drive a motor vehicle to transport passengers on an unplanned basis and charge a fare, usually based on a meter.
533054.typical_training: No formal educational credential, No work experience, Less than 1 month on-the-job training

533099.title: Motor Vehicle Operator
533099.description: All motor vehicle operators not listed separately.
533099.typical_training: No formal educational credential, No work experience, Less than 1 month on-the-job training

534011.title: Locomotive Engineer
534011.description: Drive electric, diesel-electric, steam, or gas-turbine-electric locomotives to transport passengers or freight. Interpret train orders, electronic or manual signals, and railroad rules and regulations.
534011.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, Less than 5 years work experience, 1 to 12 months on-the-job training

534013.title: Rail Yard Engineer, Dinkey Operator, or Hostler
534013.official_title: Rail Yard Engineers, Dinkey Operators, and Hostlers
534013.description: Drive switching or other locomotive or dinkey engines within railroad yard, industrial plant, quarry, construction project, or similar location.
534013.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, No work experience, 1 to 12 months on-the-job training
534013.title_es: Maquinista Ferroviario, Operador de Locomotoras Pequeñas u Obreros de Servicio de Locomotoras
534013.title_en: Rail Yard Engineer, Dinkey Operator, or Hostler
534013.title_zh: 铁路堆场工程师、Dinkey 操作员或 Hostler
534013.title_ja: 鉄道ヤードエンジニア、ディンキーオペレーター、またはホステラー
534013.title_tl: Inhinyero ng Riles Yard, Operator ng Dinkey, o Hostler

534022.title: Railroad Operator/Locomotive Firer
534022.official_title: Railroad Brake, Signal, and Switch Operators and Locomotive Firers
534022.description: Operate or monitor railroad track switches or locomotive instruments. May couple or uncouple rolling stock to make up or break up trains. Watch for and relay traffic signals. May inspect couplings, air hoses, journal boxes, and hand brakes. May watch for dragging equipment or obstacles on rights-of-way.
534022.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, No work experience, 1 to 12 months on-the-job training
534022.title_es: Operador de Frenos, Señales, y Cambios de Vías de Ferrocarril, o Fogoneros
534022.title_zh: 铁路运营商/机车消防员
534022.title_ja: 鉄道オペレーター/機関車消防士

534031.title: Railroad Conductor/Yardmaster
534031.description: Coordinate activities of switch-engine crew within railroad yard, industrial plant, or similar location. Conductors coordinate activities of train crew on passenger or freight trains. Yardmasters review train schedules and switching orders and coordinate activities of workers engaged in railroad traffic operations, such as the makeup or breakup of trains and yard switching.
534031.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, No work experience, 1 to 12 months on-the-job training
534031.title_ja: 鉄道車掌/ヤードマスター

534041.title: Subway/Streetcar Operator
534041.description: Operate subway or elevated suburban trains with no separate locomotive, or electric-powered streetcar, to transport passengers. May handle fares.
534041.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, No work experience, 1 to 12 months on-the-job training
534041.title_ja: 地下鉄・路面電車の運転手

534099.title: Rail Transportation Worker
534099.description: All rail transportation workers not listed separately.
534099.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, No work experience, 1 to 12 months on-the-job training

535011.title: Sailor/Marine Oiler
535011.description: Stand watch to look for obstructions in path of vessel, measure water depth, turn wheel on bridge, or use emergency equipment as directed by captain, mate, or pilot. Break out, rig, overhaul, and store cargo-handling gear, stationary rigging, and running gear. Perform a variety of maintenance tasks to preserve the painted surface of the ship and to maintain line and ship equipment. Must hold government-issued certification and tankerman certification when working aboard liquid-carrying vessels. Includes able seamen and ordinary seamen.
535011.typical_training: No formal educational credential, No work experience, 1 to 12 months on-the-job training
535011.title_ja: セーラー/マリンオイラー

535021.title: Water Vessel Operator
535021.official_title: Captains, Mates, and Pilots of Water Vessels
535021.description: Command or supervise operations of ships and water vessels, such as tugboats and ferryboats. Required to hold license issued by U.S. Coast Guard.
535021.typical_training: Postsecondary certificate, Less than 5 years work experience, No on-the-job training

535022.title: Motorboat Operator
535022.description: Operate small motor-driven boats. May assist in navigational activities.
535022.typical_training: Postsecondary certificate, Less than 5 years work experience, No on-the-job training
535022.title_ja: モーターボートオペレーター

535031.title: Ship Engineer
535031.description: Supervise and coordinate activities of crew engaged in operating and maintaining engines, boilers, deck machinery, and electrical, sanitary, and refrigeration equipment aboard ship.
535031.typical_training: Postsecondary certificate, Less than 5 years work experience, No on-the-job training

536011.title: Bridge and Lock Tender
536011.description: Operate and tend bridges, canal locks, and lighthouses to permit marine passage on inland waterways, near shores, and at danger points in waterway passages. May supervise such operations. Includes drawbridge operators, lock operators, and slip bridge operators.
536011.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, No work experience, Less than 1 month on-the-job training
536011.title_ja: ブリッジアンドロックテンダー

536021.title: Parking Attendant
536021.description: Park vehicles or issue tickets for customers in a parking lot or garage. May park or tend vehicles in environments such as a car dealership or rental car facility. May collect fee.
536021.typical_training: No formal educational credential, No work experience, Less than 1 month on-the-job training
536021.title_ja: パーキングアテンダント

536031.title: Automotive and Watercraft Service Attendant
536031.description: Service automobiles, buses, trucks, boats, and other automotive or marine vehicles with fuel, lubricants, and accessories. Collect payment for services and supplies. May lubricate vehicle, change motor oil, refill antifreeze, or replace lights or other accessories, such as windshield wiper blades or fan belts. May repair or replace tires.
536031.typical_training: No formal educational credential, No work experience, Less than 1 month on-the-job training
536031.title_es: Empleado de Servicio de Vehículos de Transporte
536031.title_ja: 自動車および船舶サービスアテンダント
536031.title_tl: Attendant ng Serbisyo sa Automotive at Watercraft

536032.title: Aircraft Service Attendant
536032.description: Service aircraft with fuel. May de-ice aircraft, refill water and cooling agents, empty sewage tanks, service air and oxygen systems, or clean and polish exterior.
536032.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, No work experience, Less than 1 month on-the-job training
536032.title_ja: 航空機サービスアテンダント

536041.title: Traffic Technician
536041.description: Conduct field studies to determine traffic volume, speed, effectiveness of signals, adequacy of lighting, and other factors influencing traffic conditions, under direction of traffic engineer.
536041.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, No work experience, 1 to 12 months on-the-job training

536051.title: Transportation Inspector
536051.description: Inspect equipment or goods in connection with the safe transport of cargo or people. Includes rail transportation inspectors, such as freight inspectors, rail inspectors, and other inspectors of transportation vehicles not elsewhere classified.
536051.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, No work experience, 1 to 12 months on-the-job training

536061.title: Passenger Attendant
536061.description: Provide services to ensure the safety of passengers aboard ships, buses, trains, or within the station or terminal. Perform duties such as explaining the use of safety equipment, serving meals or beverages, or answering questions related to travel.
536061.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, No work experience, Less than 1 month on-the-job training

536099.title: Transportation Worker
536099.description: All transportation workers not listed separately.
536099.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, No work experience, Less than 1 month on-the-job training

537011.title: Conveyor Operator
537011.description: Control or tend conveyors or conveyor systems that move materials or products to and from stockpiles, processing stations, departments, or vehicles. May control speed and routing of materials or products.
537011.typical_training: No formal educational credential, No work experience, Less than 1 month on-the-job training
537011.title_ja: コンベアオペレーター

537021.title: Crane/Tower Operator
537021.description: Operate mechanical boom and cable or tower and cable equipment to lift and move materials, machines, or products in many directions.
537021.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, Less than 5 years work experience, 1 to 12 months on-the-job training
537021.title_ja: クレーン/タワーオペレーター

537031.title: Dredge Operator
537031.description: Operate dredge to remove sand, gravel, or other materials in order to excavate and maintain navigable channels in waterways.
537031.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, No work experience, 1 to 12 months on-the-job training

537041.title: Hoist/Winch Operator
537041.description: Operate or tend hoists or winches to lift and pull loads using power-operated cable equipment.
537041.typical_training: No formal educational credential, No work experience, Less than 1 month on-the-job training
537041.title_ja: ホイスト/ウインチオペレーター

537051.title: Industrial Truck/Tractor Operator
537051.description: Operate industrial trucks or tractors equipped to move materials around a warehouse, storage yard, factory, construction site, or similar location.
537051.typical_training: No formal educational credential, No work experience, Less than 1 month on-the-job training
537051.title_es: Operador de Camiones y Tractores Industriales
537051.title_zh: 工业卡车/拖拉机操作员
537051.title_ja: 産業用トラック/トラクターオペレーター

537061.title: Cleaner of Vehicles and Equipment
537061.description: Wash or otherwise clean vehicles, machinery, and other equipment. Use such materials as water, cleaning agents, brushes, cloths, and hoses.
537061.typical_training: No formal educational credential, No work experience, Less than 1 month on-the-job training
537061.title_ja: 車両と装備のクリーナー
537061.title_tl: Mas malinis ng mga Sasakyan at Kagamitan

537062.title: Freight, Stock, and Material Mover
537062.official_title: Laborers and Freight, Stock, and Material Movers, Hand
537062.description: Manually move freight, stock, luggage, or other materials, or perform other general labor. Includes all manual laborers not elsewhere classified.
537062.typical_training: No formal educational credential, No work experience, Less than 1 month on-the-job training
537062.title_es: Trabajador Manual de Traslado de Carga, Mercaderías, y Materiales
537062.title_zh: 货运、库存和物料搬运商
537062.title_ja: 運送、在庫、および資材移動
537062.title_tl: Kargamento, Stock, at Materyal na Paglipat

537063.title: Machine Feeder/Offbearer
537063.description: Feed materials into or remove materials from machines or equipment that is automatic or tended by other workers.
537063.typical_training: No formal educational credential, No work experience, Less than 1 month on-the-job training
537063.title_ja: マシンフィーダ/オフベアラー

537064.title: Packer/Packager
537064.description: Pack or package by hand a wide variety of products and materials.
537064.typical_training: No formal educational credential, No work experience, Less than 1 month on-the-job training
537064.title_ja: パッカー/パッケージャー

537065.title: Stocker/Order Filler
537065.description: Receive, store, and issue merchandise, materials, equipment, and other items from stockroom, warehouse, or storage yard to fill shelves, racks, tables, or customers’ orders. May operate power equipment to fill orders. May mark prices on merchandise and set up sales displays.
537065.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, No work experience, Less than 1 month on-the-job training
537065.title_ja: ストッカー/オーダーフィラー

537071.title: Gas Pumping Station Operator
537071.official_title: Gas Compressor and Gas Pumping Station Operators
537071.description: Operate steam-, gas-, electric motor-, or internal combustion-engine driven compressors. Transmit, compress, or recover gases, such as butane, nitrogen, hydrogen, and natural gas.
537071.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, No work experience, 1 to 12 months on-the-job training
537071.title_es: Operador de Estaciones de Bombeo de Gas
537071.title_ja: ガスポンプステーションオペレーター

537072.title: Pump Operator
537072.description: Tend, control, or operate power-driven, stationary, or portable pumps and manifold systems to transfer gases, oil, other liquids, slurries, or powdered materials to and from various vessels and processes.
537072.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, No work experience, 1 to 12 months on-the-job training

537073.title: Wellhead Pumper
537073.description: Operate power pumps and auxiliary equipment to produce flow of oil or gas from wells in oil field.
537073.typical_training: High school diploma or equivalent, Less than 5 years work experience, 1 to 12 months on-the-job training
537073.title_es: Operador de Sistemas de Bombeo de Pozos

537081.title: Refuse and Recyclable Material Collector
537081.description: Collect and dump refuse or recyclable materials from containers into truck. May drive truck.
537081.typical_training: No formal educational credential, No work experience, Less than 1 month on-the-job training
537081.title_es: Recolector de Residuos y Materiales Reciclables
537081.title_zh: 垃圾和可回收材料收集器
537081.title_ja: ごみとリサイクル可能な材料コレクター

537121.title: Truck/Ship Loader
537121.official_title: Tank Car, Truck, and Ship Loaders
537121.description: Load and unload chemicals and bulk solids, such as coal, sand, and grain, into or from tank cars, trucks, or ships, using material moving equipment. May perform a variety of other tasks relating to shipment of products. May gauge or sample shipping tanks and test them for leaks.
537121.typical_training: No formal educational credential, No work experience, Less than 1 month on-the-job training
537121.title_es: Cargador de Vagones, Camiones y Barcos Tanque
537121.title_ja: トラック/船舶用ローダー
